name: Benny the Ball
description:
Solve the puzzle and get Benny to the end!

Benny the Ball is a mouse-only ball puzzle game with physics and changing states. Use your intuition to figure out how to progress through the levels and help Benny to reach the finish!

Benny the Ball was created for the Honours Project module of my univsersity course of Games Design at the University of Central Lancashire. UCLan Games Design: https://gamescourse.co.uk/
